welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ballenger Creek, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport handles all incoming and outgoing freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
